rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey Boss, did you know? They're
scouting for Drivers over there.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0002
rows.name:
Yeah, I'm aware. I noticed it
when we first arrived in town.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0003
rows.name:
You should give it a shot,
Boss! You'd definitely pass!

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm being pursued by the
Superbian Empire, you know?
I think I'd be discovered.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0005
rows.name: Oh, right...

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0006
rows.name:
I was just really curious to see what
kind of Blade you might awaken.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0007
rows.name:
In any case, I already
have Homura with me.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0008
rows.name:
Wait, Rex. Don't tell me you
thought Drivers could only
bond with a single Blade?

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0009
rows.name: Huh? Is that not the case?

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0010
rows.name: No, that's not right.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0011
rows.name:
Without Nia around, we're
probably a bit undermanned
for serious combat.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0012
rows.name:
Why not try bonding with a
new Blade while we're here?

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0013
rows.name:
Having another Blade would open up
new combat options for you as well.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0014
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0015
rows.name:
Increasing our combat strength
would ease Homura's strain too.
It seems like a win-win situation.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0016
rows.name:
If Homura doesn't mind, I
suppose I could give it a try?

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0017
rows.name:
Of course it's fine. It's good to
have more companions, isn't it?

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0018
rows.name: Then it settled!

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0019
rows.name:
But the issue is getting a
Core Crystal, isn't it?

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0020
rows.name: No need to worry about that.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0021
rows.name:
You can use the Core Crystal
I've been hiding away.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0022
rows.name:
Where could you possibly hide
it in such a tiny body...

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0023
rows.name:
A Driver's mental and spiritual
state plays a huge role in
bonding with a Blade.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0024
rows.name:
Focus your consciousness and
touch the Core Crystal.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0025
rows.name:
Make sure to clearly visualize
the Blade you wish to bond with.

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0026
rows.name:
I don't fully get it, but
I'll try. So I just need
to give it a shot, right?

rows.label: fev02_250_125_msg0027
rows.name: I hope you awaken a wonderful Blade!
